abstract: Pentagon investigation finds Maj Gen Ronald F Lewis, onetime senior military assistant to Defense Sec Ashton B Carter, used his government credit card at strip clubs in Rome and Seoul and had improper interactions with women.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: A report by the Defense Department inspector general alleges that Maj. Gen. Ronald F. Lewis visited strip clubs overseas and had improper interactions with women.
snippet: A report by the Defense Department inspector general alleges that Maj. Gen. Ronald F. Lewis visited strip clubs overseas and had improper interactions with women....

headline.main: Army General Used Government Credit Card at Strip Clubs, Pentagon Says
headline.print_headline: Pentagon Finds Misconduct by a General
